TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NetworkInterface extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供網路介面的組態和統計資訊。

span.span: Provides configuration and statistical information for a network interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別會封裝為網路介面，也就是配接器，在本機電腦上的資料。This class encapsulates data for network interfaces, also known as adapters, on the local computer. 您不會建立這個類別; 的執行個體方法會傳回陣列，其中包含此類別的每個網路介面，在本機電腦上的一個執行個體。You do not create instances of this class; the method returns an array that contains one instance of this class for each network interface on the local computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示介面的相關資訊。The following code example displays information about interfaces. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#12)]

span.span: for executing unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能由衍生自的類別可以呼叫這個建構函式類別。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the description of the interface.
A that describes this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 人類看得懂的文字描述的網路介面的描述。The description is human-readable text that describes the network interface. 在描述中所包含的資訊取決於作業系統的功能。The information included in the description depends on the capabilities of the operating system. 在 Windows，它通常是指介面廠商、 型別 （例如，乙太網路）、 品牌和模型。On Windows, it typically describes the interface vendor, type (for example, Ethernet), brand, and model. 其他平台，它可能是盡可能簡短的介面，名稱，例如`eth0`。On other platforms, it may be as brief as the name of the interface, such as `eth0`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示在本機電腦上的所有介面的摘要。The following code example displays a summary for all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface[] GetAllNetworkInterfaces() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetAllNetworkInterfaces () As NetworkInterface()

summary.span: 傳回物件，其描述本機電腦上的網路介面。

span.span: Returns objects that describe the network interfaces on the local computer.

returns.span: 陣列，其中包含描述可用之網路介面的物件，但如果沒有偵測到介面則為空陣列。

span.span: A array that contains objects that describe the available network interfaces, or an empty array if no interfaces are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在電腦上的網路介面會提供網路連線。The network interfaces on a computer provide network connectivity. 網路介面是也稱為網路介面卡。Network interfaces are also known as network adapters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的網路介面卡的網域名稱服務 (DNS) 組態資訊。The following code example displays Domain Name Service (DNS) configuration information for the local computer's network adapters. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#41)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#41)]

exception.span: Windows 系統函式呼叫失敗。

span.span: A Windows system function call failed.

Public Overridable Function GetIPProperties () As IPInterfaceProperties

summary.span: 傳回物件，其描述這個網路介面的組態。

span.span: Returns an object that describes the configuration of this network interface.

returns.span: 物件，其描述這個網路介面。

span.span: An object that describes this network interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件中的資訊會反映這個陣列建立時間為準的介面。Note that the information in the object returned by this method reflects the interfaces as of the time the array is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的網路介面卡支援 IPv4 的資訊。The following code example displays information for the local computer's network adapters that support IPv4. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool GetIsNetworkAvailable() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetIsNetworkAvailable () As Boolean

summary.span: 指出是否有任何網路連接可使用。

span.span: Indicates whether any network connection is available.

returns.span: 如果有可用的網路連接則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a network connection is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路連線視為可用，如果任何網路介面標示為 「 向上 」，而不是回送 」 或 「 通道介面。A network connection is considered to be available if any network interface is marked "up" and is not a loopback or tunnel interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.PhysicalAddress GetPhysicalAddress() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetPhysicalAddress () As PhysicalAddress
abstract member GetPhysicalAddress : unit -> System.Net.NetworkInformation.PhysicalAddress override this.GetPhysicalAddress : unit -> System.Net.NetworkInformation.PhysicalAddress

summary.span: 傳回這個介面卡的媒體存取控制 (MAC) 或實體位址。

span.span: Returns the Media Access Control (MAC) or physical address for this adapter.
A object that contains the physical address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的物件會包含適合用來傳輸資料，在資料連結層媒體的位址。The object returned by this method contains an address that is appropriate to the media used to transport data at the data link layer. 例如，乙太網路，這個方法會傳回乙太網路硬體位址。For example, on an Ethernet network, this method returns the Ethernet hardware address. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦上的所有介面實體位址。The following code example displays the physical addresses of all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#51)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#51)]

summary.span: 取得 IPv6 回送介面的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the IPv6 loopback interface.
The index for the IPv6 loopback interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路介面可能會有不同的介面索引，IPv4 和 IPv6 回送介面。A network interface may have different interface indexes for the IPv4 and IPv6 loopback interface. P:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.IPv6LoopbackInterfaceIndex 屬性只會傳回 IPv6 回送介面。The P:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.IPv6LoopbackInterfaceIndex property only returns the IPv6 loopback interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LoopbackInterfaceIndex As Integer
public: static property int LoopbackInterfaceIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得 IPv4 回送介面的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the IPv4 loopback interface.

value.span: ，包含 IPv4 回送介面的索引。

span.span: A that contains the index for the IPv4 loopback interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回送介面的索引通常是 1，但您不能依賴這。The index of the loopback interface is usually 1, but you cannot rely on this. 使用屬性來取得正確的值。Use the property to get the correct value. 網路介面可能會有不同的介面索引，IPv4 和 IPv6 回送介面。A network interface may have different interface indexes for the IPv4 and IPv6 loopback interface. 屬性只會傳回 IPv4 回送介面。The property only returns the IPv4 loopback interface.

exception.span: 這個屬性在只執行 Ipv6 的電腦上是無效的。

span.span: This property is not valid on computers running only Ipv6.

A that contains the adapter name.

[!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property NetworkInterfaceType As NetworkInterfaceType

span.span: Gets the interface type.
An value that specifies the network interface type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面型別會詳細說明列舉文件。The interface types are described in detail in the enumeration documentation. 基本上，這個屬性會傳回的任何成員列舉型別。In principle, this property can return any member of the enumeration. 它會傳回特定值是取決於基礎網路拓撲的執行階段條件。The specific value that it does return is dependent on the runtime conditions of the underlying network topology. 這表示：This means that: - 您不可以判斷事先哪一個值的屬性會傳回特定的網路。It is not possible to determine in advance which value the property returns for a particular network. - 可以，在特定的網路上的做法，列舉值的完整範圍不能使用。It is possible that in practice on a particular network, the full range of enumeration values is not available. 例如，在 gigabit 乙太網路上，就可以屬性會傳回而非。For example, on a gigabit Ethernet network, it is possible that the property returns rather than . ## Examples 下列範例顯示在本機電腦上的所有介面的型別資訊。The following example displays type information for all interfaces on the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#51)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#51)]

span.span: Gets the speed of the network interface.

value.span: 值，指定速度 (每秒位元數)。

span.span: A value that specifies the speed in bits per second.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的值會報告網路介面。The value returned by this property is reported by the network interface. 它不是動態計算。It is not computed dynamically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在本機電腦上顯示之介面的速度。The following code example demonstrates displaying the speed of interfaces on the local computer. summary.span: 取得 值，指出網路介面是否啟用為可接收多點傳送封包。

value.span: 如果介面可接收多點傳送封包，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the interface receives multicast packets; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送是同時將資料封包傳送至多個目的地的動作。Multicasting is the act of sending a data packet to multiple destinations simultaneously. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示在本機電腦上的所有介面的摘要。The following code example displays a summary for all interfaces on the local computer.
